pr_title: ISPN-11740 Add blockhound to lock module

timeline.message: ISPN-11740 Add blockhound to lock module

ISPN-11553 Remove use of blocking executor from cluster locks

* Rely on non blocking nature of functional map

timeline.bodyText: This diff looks all mangled. But basically I just moved everything over a bit to the left. No actual code change besides the removal of the use of the execute invocation.
timeline.author: wburns
